message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR 

This paper deals with authorship attribution using computational stylometry, which involves statistical methods to differentiate the writing style of different authors. This falls under the sub-category of natural language processing (cs.CL) and information retrieval (cs.IR). The use of classifiers such as fuzzy learning and SVM also falls under machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the problem of plagiarism detection falls under the sub-category of cryptography and security (cs.CR).
